EmailTemplate.subject: IntApp Newsletter...
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName}, Attached is the latest IntApp company newsletter.
Regards,
db
October 2010 edition:
New Customers and New Upgrades
We are pleased to welcome several new members to the IntApp community and acknowledge existing customers who have upgraded, kicked off upgrade initiatives, or acquired additional IntApp products.
Integration Builder: Bennett Jones SLP Honigman Miller Schwartz and Cohn LLP Ice Miller LLP Vinson & Elkins, L.L.P.
Wall Builder/Activity Tracker: Finnegan, Henderson, Farabow, Garrett & Dunner, LLP Fraser Milner Casgrain LLP Howrey LLP Paul Hastings Sidley Austin LLP Townsend Vinson & Elkins, L.L.P. White & Case LLP Wilmer Cutler Pickering Hale and Dorr LLP Winston & Strawn LLP
Time Builder: Fenwick & West LLP Morrison & Foerster LLP O'Melveny & Myers LLP Vorys, Sater, Seymour and Pease LLP Young Conaway Stargatt & Taylor, LLP
IntApp Going Virtual
We are continuing to encourage our clients to switch to the software-only version of our products. The following firms have recently moved over to our virtual platform:
Alston & Bird LLP Balch & Bingham LLP Finnegan, Henderson, Farabow, Garrett & Dunner, LLP Paul Hastings Perkins Coie LLP
For more information about migrating to a virtual platform, email Neal.Vora@intapp.com
New IntApp Team Member
We're pleased to announce that Stuart Douglass has joined IntApp as Managing Director for the United States Central Region.
Stuart brings 12 years of legal industry sales expertise to IntApp. Previously, he held several positions with Autonomy iManage including Regional Vice President of Sales.
"I'm excited to welcome Stuart to the IntApp team," said Dan Tacone, President, IntApp. "His extensive experience in the legal market will help accelerate our continued growth."
Stuart can be reached at: Stuart.Douglass@intapp.com.
Announcing Wall Builder 4.3
We’re pleased to announce the availability of Wall Builder 4.3. This latest release adds new features including extended management of the relationships between peoples, places and printers, including support for lawyer-secretary pairings, to ensure greater compliance with ethical screening policies.
It also brings updated security and data integration extensions for Elite 3E, InterAction’s Matters Module, SharePoint 2010, DTE Axiom and DTE. Wall Builder 4.3 also includes several interface enhancements including expanded user-defined fields, are greater configuration options and additional API functionality. More detailed information is available on the IntApp Customer Community.
Regional User Group Meetings
We recently hosted User Group meetings in the following cities: Washington, DC (at McKenna Long), Philadelphia (at Cozen O'Connor), Seattle (Davis Wright Tremaine), Atlanta (Troutman Sanders), and Toronto (Stikeman Elliott). These meetings are an opportunity for clients to present case studies about how they’re using our products, and for us to share company and product updates, and collect feedback. Thank you to the firms who hosted and also to those that gave presentations.
If you are in New York or London and would like to participate in an upcoming user group meeting, or just would like more information, email Lisa.Hern@intapp.com
Fall Webinars and Conferences
On October 29, we will be hosting a webinar on Integration Builder. Wes Settle will discuss how Alston & Bird has streamlined various day-to-day business processes, achieving significant benefit for the firm. For more details and registration, go to http://www.intapp.com/reg/halloweenwebinarregister.html. We will be posting this on our website (see below) after the event.
We also recently hosted two very successful Wall Builder and Time Builder webinars, featuring IntApp client Holland and Knight.
To view recordings of our webinars, visit:
Risk: www.intapp.com/products/wbwebinars.html. Revenue: www.intapp.com/products/tbwebinars.html. Integration: www.intapp.com/products/ibwebinars.html.
In October alone, we logged over 200 registrants! Thank you to all of our guest speakers who have participated in our webinar series.
We would also like to take a moment to recognize Paul Heywood of Field Fisher Waterhouse for his participation in recent Elite UK User Conference. He spoke about his firm's experience with IntApp Time Builder.
Law Firm Finance Blog
For more detailed news updates on law firm finance, you can read the new law firm finance blog at: http://www.lawfirmfinanceblog.com, a resource for financial professionals. Stay up to date on latest industry developments and news and sign up for email updates.
Law Firm Risk Blog
Stay up to date on latest industry developments and news and sign up for email updates on finance and risk management on the blogs below.
For news updates on law firm finance: www.lawfirmfinanceblog.com. For news updates on law firm risk management: www.lawfirmrisk.com.
Client News Release Program
We would like to thank firms who have participated in our client news release program. Recent participants include: Sutherland, McCarter & English, DWF, Hogan Lovells, and Addleshaw Goddard. Through this program, we publicly showcase the success of new and existing clients. Press releases can be viewed at http://www.intapp.com/company/news.
If you would like to participate in our press release program, please email Dan Bressler (danb@intapp.com).
